definition: "flying fish family", family who sacrifice everything to send their children abroad to study

sentences.english: A hovering mar-of-war bird showed him where dolphin were chasing some flying fish.
sentences.chinese: 鸟给他指明了海豚追逐飞鱼的地方。

sentences.english: Fly Fish, Parasailing for one round, Jet Ski for 15 minute.
sentences.chinese: 飞鱼，水上滑翔伞一趟，摩托艇15分钟。

sentences.english: He was evry fond of flying fish as they were his principal friends on the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 他喜爱飞鱼，因为它们是他在海上主要的朋友。

sentences.english: A flying fish is excellent to eat raw and I would not have to cut him up.
sentences.chinese: 飞鱼生吃味道是呱呱叫的，而且不用把它切成小块。

sentences.english: A hovering mar-of-war bird showed him where dolphin were chasing some flying fish.
sentences.chinese: 一只盘旋的军舰鸟给他指明了海豚追逐飞鱼的地方。

sentences.english: The flying fish shortcut isn't available to all particles.
sentences.chinese: 飞鱼的快捷方式并不对所有的粒子都有效。

sentences.english: Their most potent weapon was the Exocet missile.
sentences.chinese: 飞鱼导弹是他们最有攻击力的武器。

sentences.english: One type is a 10-man boat that is used during the flying fish season.
sentences.chinese: 一种是在飞鱼季中使用的十人座船。

sentences.english: A hovering man-of-war bird showed him where dolphin were chasing some flying fish, but the school was moving too fast and too far away.
sentences.chinese: 一只盘旋的军舰鸟给老人指明了海豚追逐飞鱼的地方。

sentences.english: At night, flying-fish often landed on the deck.
sentences.chinese: 在晚上，飞鱼经常降落到甲板上。

sentences.english: Flying fish leap for their lives and stay airborne for extraordinary lengths of time.
sentences.chinese: 飞鱼跳跃前进，在空中停留的时间特别长。

sentences.english: Can a flying-fish flee far from a free fish fry?
sentences.chinese: 飞鱼能从一次免费的油炸鱼聚餐会会逃跑吗？

sentences.english: They are our brothers like the flying fish.
sentences.chinese: 它们和飞鱼一样，是我们跑船人的兄弟。

sentences.english: Occasionally, flying fish broke the surface of the water, gliding along the waves.
sentences.chinese: 时不时的还有飞鱼踊出水面，沿波滑翔。

sentences.english: It has more nourishment than almost any fish, he thought. At least the kind of strength that I need.
sentences.chinese: 飞鱼几乎比任何一种鱼都更富营养，他想。

definition: variant of 劍魚|剑鱼[jian4 yu2]
to set sail/to brave the waves
skate (cartilaginous fish belonging to the family Rajidae)/ray (fish)
legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods
Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)
